website_summaries.verdict: An affordable megaphone that includes a number of features typically found on pricier models.
pros: This mini megaphone features a siren, recording, playback, and volume control
It is a lightweight device with a foldable handle and a wrist strap
cons: This unit may not be as loud as you are expecting

customer_reviews.title: I Love(d) It
customer_reviews.text: It worked brilliantly and at a fraction of the price of other, comparable, products. All was well until the eejit I bought it for used it in an Alabama downpour and it got a thorough soaking. So, yeah, you'll be very happy with it unless you plan on trying to use it in a rainstorm - it won't come back from that. I'll probably buy one again, eventually, I'll just be wary of who gets to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Majombaszo

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Clear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for using on a gun range in the wind so all can hear. It is clear and very loud. I love the always on feature of the mic as well. Unfortunately after just a couple years of occasional use it died. The amp went out so it is garbage.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great for crowd control, parties, or just plain old mischief. Takes 8 D batteries but they seem to last a long time. I have had this for almost 2 years and haven't needed to replace them yet. The only strange drawbacks is the useless toggle trigger. The trigger is just for show. You must use the detachable mic at all times. Other than that, I have been very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt the Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good as First. Then bad
customer_reviews.text: at first I thought that this was a great way for me to have to yell lucky, then it just randomly stopped working after a few weeks. For no reason this happened.... Disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: this is a very strong and powerful megaphone. I loved it until it broke after only two weeks of use. I hate the inconvenience of having to wait for another delivery. I will try to find the same item at a local store. It is great and I love the black color.

customer_reviews.title: BRRRRRAP!!!! Uzi makes a fine megaphone!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this megaphone black and totally badass-looking, but it has a really high-quality siren with an excellent amount of wail that is perfectly suited for bashment parties. It's loud as hell and has a pretty fun built-in recording function that allows you to yell at people repeatedly without even uttering a sound. Yeah! Big up to the fine folks at Uzi, you make quality weaponry and now I can also vouch for your amazing audio assaulting products.
customer_reviews.author: La Picosa

customer_reviews.title: Copy that isn't on the cheap side...
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't live up to how it's advertised!!! It's not a 50W megaphone but 25W and it has a cheap copy feel to it compared with high end products prized more or less the same... The sound also has that unmistakable "crappy" twang to it. Great disappointment. M

customer_reviews.title: One Worked, Second One Didn't
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these and one worked, the other didn't. From the other reviews it sounds as though there is a definite quality issue with these.
